NAME: Dimensional Laboratories
DESCRIPTION: Create labs capable of experimenting through dimensional barriers.

NAME: Exoplane Modeling
DESCRIPTION: Grants a deeper understanding of the underlying fabric of the universe.

NAME: Basic Experimentation
DESCRIPTION: Perform experiments to further our understanding of science.

NAME: Interstellar Communication
DESCRIPTION: Establish contact with other species among the stars.

NAME: Space Warfare
DESCRIPTION: Develop theories about how to conduct war in space.

NAME: Space Weapons
DESCRIPTION: Laying out plans to build weapons for use in space.

NAME: Space Armor
DESCRIPTION: Forging armor for ships in space.

NAME: Hull Plating I
DESCRIPTION: Thick hull plating to deflect incoming projectiles.

NAME: Energy Shields I
DESCRIPTION: Energy shields to block incoming lasers.

NAME: Point Defense I
DESCRIPTION: Point defense to shoot down torpedos.
